skills.name: Aura of Majesty
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If a Crystallize reaction occurs, then this character will perform $[K1012].\nIf during the usage of this skill, the character hasn't absorbed an element's power yet, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126022]</color> will be attached.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>. If a Crystallize reaction occurs, then this character will perform <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Absorption</color>.\nIf during the usage of this skill, the character hasn't absorbed an element's power yet, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color> will be attached.
skills.description:
Deals 3 Geo DMG. If a Crystallize reaction occurs, then this character will perform Elemental Absorption.
If during the usage of this skill, the character hasn't absorbed an element's power yet, then Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization will be attached.

skills.name: Frostspike Wave
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. This character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color>.
skills.description: Deals 3 Cryo DMG. This character gains Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization.

skills.name: Decimating Rockfall
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. DMG +1 for each element previously absorbed.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>. DMG +1 for each element previously absorbed.
skills.description: Deals 4 Geo DMG. DMG +1 for each element previously absorbed.

skills.name: Stone Facets
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126021]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Stone Facets: Elemental Absorption</color>.
skills.description: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Stone Facets: Elemental Absorption.
